instructions.title: How To Turn Off Automatic Renewal for Classmates.com
instructions.before: To discontinue your paid membership after the current term, you can opt out of automatic renewal any time before your renewal date. By changing to Manual renewal or just canceling your payment, your account will not be charged again.  On your expiration date your membership will revert to free status.
instructions.after: Please note, canceling your automatic renewal does not delete your account.  It just cancels your payments.  Please follow the steps on deleting your account for permanent deletion.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your information is removed from classmates.com and you can no longer access the system.

qnAnswers.question: How can I review and update my billing info?
qnAnswers.answer: Click on [this link] (https://secure.classmates.com/checkout/account/billing/home) to be directed to the accounts and billing page to review your account status.  Please note, Classmates and membership subscriptions are enrolled in the automatic renewal program when the initial online payment is submitted. You can adjust your payment settings here.

steps: [Log onto the Classmates.com Homepage](https://secure.classmates.com/auth/login). If you are already logged in doing so will open your classmates.com homepage.
Click Gear Icon on Top Right
Click Account and BIlling and Enter your Password
Click Turn off Automatic renewal under Account Information.  If you do not see this feature then you do not have a Paid Account. Then Click Yes to Confirm.

slides.alt: Classmates.com-Turn Off Automatic Renewal from Website. Step 5: Click Turn off Automatic renewal under Account Information.  If you do not see this feature then you do not have a Paid Account. Then Click Yes to Confirm.
slides.title: Turn Off Automatic Renewal

instructions.title: How To Delete Your Free Classmates.com Account
instructions.before: If youâ€™d like to remove your free registration, follow the steps below and click on the Classmates.com Deletion Link.  From here your account will be deleted.

qnAnswers.answer: Your information is removed from classmates.com and you can no longer access the system.

qnAnswers.answer: Click on [this link] (https://secure.classmates.com/checkout/account/billing/home) to be directed to the accounts and billing page to review your account status.  Please note, Classmates and membership subscriptions are enrolled in the automatic renewal program when the initial online payment is submitted. You can adjust your payment settings here.

steps: Click here for the [Deletion Link] (https://secure.classmates.com/auth/removemember). If you are already logged in, you will be brought straight to the deletion page.
